requirement_tested: Display a course catalog with searchable and filterable course listings
user_persona: A prospective student browsing for cybersecurity courses.
user_goal: Find beginner-level courses in the 'Network Security' category.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Course Catalog
narrative_steps.description: Sarah visits the Global Institute website and navigates to the course catalog page to explore available courses.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to /courses
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The course catalog loads with a search bar and filter options above a grid of course cards on a lavender background.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: Sarah wants to narrow down her options, so she clicks the filter icon and selects 'Network Security' under Category and 'Beginner' under Difficulty Level.
narrative_steps.action: Click the filter icon, then select 'Network Security' and 'Beginner' from the dropdown menus.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The course grid updates dynamically to show only beginner-level network security courses with indigo-styled cards.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Filtered Results
narrative_steps.description: Sarah hovers over one of the filtered course cards to get a better look before deciding which course to learn more about.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a course card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The hovered card slightly elevates with a shadow effect, emphasizing its interactivity.

requirement_tested: Show detailed course information pages including descriptions, prerequisites, and schedules
user_persona: A student interested in enrolling in a specific course.
user_goal: Learn more about the 'Introduction to Ethical Hacking' course before enrolling.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Course Details
narrative_steps.description: After browsing the catalog, Alex clicks on the 'Introduction to Ethical Hacking' course card to see its full details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the course card titled 'Introduction to Ethical Hacking'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Alex is redirected to the course detail page with a lavender background and indigo headings displaying the course description, prerequisites, and schedule.

narrative_steps.title: Deciding to Enroll
narrative_steps.description: Convinced by the content, Alex decides to enroll and clicks the prominent 'Enroll Now' button located at the top of the page.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Enroll Now' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Alex is redirected to the enrollment flow page where he can proceed with registration or login.

requirement_tested: Enable online course enrollment with user registration and payment processing
user_persona: A new user ready to register and pay for a course.
user_goal: Register for an account and complete payment for the selected course.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Enrollment
narrative_steps.description: Jamie, a first-time visitor, begins the enrollment process and is prompted to either log in or register.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Register' and fill in personal details like name, email, and password.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The registration form validates inputs and creates a new user record upon submission, redirecting to the payment step.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Payment
narrative_steps.description: Jamie reviews the course details and proceeds to enter payment information securely through the integrated payment gateway.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Proceed to Payment' after reviewing the course summary.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The payment gateway interface appears, allowing Jamie to complete the transaction safely.

requirement_tested: Integrate a chatbot for user support and inquiries
user_persona: A confused user seeking help navigating the site.
user_goal: Get assistance understanding how to apply filters on the course catalog.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Chat Support
narrative_steps.description: While browsing the course catalog, Morgan notices the chat icon in the bottom-right corner and clicks it to ask a question.
narrative_steps.action: Click the chatbot icon in the bottom-right corner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A chat window opens with an indigo header and message bubbles on a lavender background.

narrative_steps.title: Sending Inquiry
narrative_steps.description: Morgan types a question asking how to filter courses by difficulty level and submits it.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'How do I filter courses by difficulty?' and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chatbot responds instantly with instructions on using the filter dropdowns.

requirement_tested: Include a contact form for direct communication with the institute
user_persona: A potential corporate client wanting more information.
user_goal: Send a message to inquire about customized training packages.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Contact Page
narrative_steps.description: Riley, representing a company, goes to the contact page to send an inquiry about group training sessions.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to /contact
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The contact form with fields for name, email, subject, and message appears on a lavender background with indigo-styled input fields.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Inquiry
narrative_steps.description: Riley fills out the form with his details and a request for a consultation, then clicks the 'Send Message' button.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in the form fields and click 'Send Message'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form submits successfully, storing the inquiry in the database and notifying the institute's support team.

requirement_tested: Present certification pathways with progress tracking and completion status
user_persona: A returning student checking progress toward certification.
user_goal: View current progress in the Cybersecurity Expert certification track.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Certification Pathways
narrative_steps.description: Taylor logs in and navigates to the certification pathways section to check her progress.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Certifications' in the main navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Taylor sees a list of certification tracks with titles, descriptions, and indigo-styled progress bars indicating completion percentage.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Detailed Progress
narrative_steps.description: She clicks on the 'Cybersecurity Expert' track to see detailed information and her current standing.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Cybersecurity Expert' certification track.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A detailed view loads showing required courses, completed modules, and a visual indicator of overall progress.

requirement_tested: Implement user authentication and account management features
user_persona: A registered user updating personal information.
user_goal: Update contact details in the account settings.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Jordan returns to the site and logs into his existing account to make some changes.
narrative_steps.action: Go to /login, enter valid credentials, and submit the form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Jordan is authenticated and redirected to his dashboard with a welcome message.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Profile Information
narrative_steps.description: From the dashboard, Jordan navigates to the account settings and updates his phone number.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Account Settings', edit the phone field, and click 'Save Changes'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The updated phone number is saved in the database and reflected immediately on the page.

requirement_tested: Provide a responsive navigation menu and consistent page layout
user_persona: A mobile user exploring different sections of the site.
user_goal: Browse the course catalog and certifications using the mobile navigation menu.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Mobile Menu
narrative_steps.description: Using his smartphone, Marcus visits the homepage and needs to navigate to the courses section.
narrative_steps.action: Click the hamburger menu icon in the top navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The mobile menu expands vertically with links for Home, Courses, Certifications, Contact, and Dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Sections
narrative_steps.description: Marcus taps on 'Courses' to browse the catalog and later switches to 'Certifications' to explore pathways.
narrative_steps.action: Tap on 'Courses' and then tap on 'Certifications' from the expanded menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each tap smoothly transitions to the respective section, maintaining the lavender background and indigo-styled components.

requirement_tested: Apply lavender background color and indigo component styling across all pages
user_persona: A visually impaired user relying on consistent styling for readability.
user_goal: Navigate the site comfortably with consistent visual cues.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Patricia opens the homepage and immediately appreciates the high-contrast lavender and indigo color scheme.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All elements display a consistent lavender background (#E6E6FA) with indigo (#4B0082) used for headers, buttons, and interactive components.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Other Pages
narrative_steps.description: Patricia moves between the course catalog, contact page, and dashboard, noting the uniform design language throughout.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to multiple pages including /courses, /contact, and /dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Every visited page maintains the same lavender background and indigo-styled UI elements for consistency.

requirement_tested: Enable users to browse courses by category, difficulty level, or certification track
user_persona: A career changer looking for advanced cloud security courses.
user_goal: Find advanced courses within the Cloud Security certification track.

narrative_steps.title: Using Advanced Filters
narrative_steps.description: Casey wants to focus on advanced topics, so she uses the filter options to refine the course catalog.
narrative_steps.action: Click the filter icon and select 'Cloud Security' under Certification Track and 'Advanced' under Difficulty Level.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The course grid updates to display only advanced-level courses associated with the Cloud Security certification track.

requirement_tested: Display course availability and enrollment deadlines
user_persona: A last-minute learner trying to enroll before the deadline.
user_goal: Check if there are still seats available in a desired course before the enrollment deadline.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Availability
narrative_steps.description: Dana finds a course she’s interested in and checks whether it’s still accepting enrollments.
narrative_steps.action: View the course card in the catalog.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each course card displays the number of available seats and the enrollment deadline in indigo text on a lavender background.

requirement_tested: Include a user dashboard to manage enrolled courses and certifications
user_persona: A busy professional managing multiple ongoing courses.
user_goal: Quickly access active courses and certification progress from the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: After logging in, Sam is taken directly to his personalized dashboard to monitor his learning activities.
narrative_steps.action: Log in and land on the dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dashboard displays indigo-styled cards for Enrolled Courses, Certification Progress, Account Settings, and Support on a lavender background.

narrative_steps.title: Managing Learning Activities
narrative_steps.description: Sam clicks on his enrolled course card to continue studying and later checks his certification progress.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a course card and then click on a certification progress card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Clicking the course card takes him to the course detail page; clicking the certification card shows his progress details.

requirement_tested: Implement search functionality across course catalog and certification pathways
user_persona: A researcher searching for specific topics covered in courses or certifications.
user_goal: Use the global search bar to find courses and certifications related to 'Penetration Testing'.

narrative_steps.title: Typing Search Query
narrative_steps.description: Ashley types 'Penetration Testing' into the global search bar located in the header.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Penetration Testing' into the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Real-time suggestions appear below the search bar, highlighting matching courses and certification pathways.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search
narrative_steps.description: Ashley presses Enter to view all results related to her query.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter after typing the search term.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A results page lists all matching courses and certification paths with indigo highlights on a lavender background.

requirement_tested: Provide confirmation and receipt generation for successful enrollments
user_persona: A newly enrolled student expecting proof of purchase.
user_goal: Receive a confirmation page and email receipt after completing enrollment.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Confirmation
narrative_steps.description: After finishing the payment process, Chris expects to see a confirmation page summarizing the transaction.
narrative_steps.action: Complete the enrollment and payment process.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A confirmation page loads displaying a receipt with course details, payment amount, and transaction ID using indigo headers on a lavender background.

narrative_steps.title: Getting Email Receipt
narrative_steps.description: Chris also looks forward to receiving an email copy of the receipt shortly after.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for email delivery.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An automated email arrives with the same receipt details formatted according to the HTML/CSS template.

requirement_tested: Ensure accessibility compliance and mobile-responsive design
user_persona: A user with motor impairments accessing the site via keyboard navigation.
user_goal: Successfully navigate the entire site using only keyboard controls.

narrative_steps.title: Keyboard Navigation
narrative_steps.description: Kevin relies solely on keyboard navigation due to limited mobility and accesses the site accordingly.
narrative_steps.action: Tab through the homepage and other key pages without using a mouse.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive elements are reachable and usable via Tab key, with clear focus indicators adhering to WCAG 2.1 standards.

narrative_steps.title: Responsive Layout Check
narrative_steps.description: Kevin resizes the browser window to ensure content remains accessible on smaller screens.
narrative_steps.action: Resize the browser window to simulate mobile viewing.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Content reflows appropriately using CSS media queries, ensuring readability and usability on all device sizes.
